card.name: Rules part 2
card.text:
Types of cards:
Action Cards (Green) You must do what the card says.
Mandatory Cards (Red) Everybody must do what the card says.
Backstab Cards (Purple) Keep these cards face down in front of you. You may use them at any time during the game (unless specified otherwise on the card).
Status Cards (Yellow) Keep these cards face up in front of you. As long as they are there you must do what they say. They can only be removed by other cards (unless specified otherwise on the card).
